title: CEO at Intrawebel
text:
"Beauty lies in the hands of the codeholder"

Today marks the start of the Intrawebel Annual Code Marathon(ACM), we will be accepting applicants until 18/8.

The theme this year will be an application that can help better the environment and urge people to become more environment friendly!

We are looking forward to the new applications this year, have fun coding!
comments: This is a great opportunity and a great theme. I am up to the challenge :)
What a perfect way to show concern about the environment and promote talent, keep being awesome!

title: Recruiter at Loopsterdam
text:
I am announcing that the recruiting process for the summer season has ended, all applicants that passed will be privately messaged at the first week of September.

Congratulations to all applicants and have a great summer holiday.
comments: Congratulations to all applicants! I am looking forward to the results.

title: Junior Programmer at Intrawebex
text:
I have made my very own coding language! :^)

Check it out: codewithpopstar
